solution_line_template: Being {distance_spain_russia} km the distance from Spain to Russia. To get from Germany to Russia, Peter has to travel {distance_spain_russia} - {distance_spain_germany} = <<{distance_spain_russia}-{distance_spain_germany}={distance_germany_russia}>>{distance_germany_russia} km

Knowing both distances, Peter will answer that he has to fly {distance_germany_russia} + {distance_spain_russia} = <<{distance_germany_russia}+{distance_spain_russia}={total_distance_to_fly}>>{total_distance_to_fly} km
